From
, local train S11 heads to Trimmelkam. You may need to take local train S1 to

. Salzburg to Trimmelkam takes 40-50 min and costs €6.20. A Trimmelkam taxi company, Taxi Kirchhammer, can be called on +43 664 4219253.

From
, head to Tittmoning-Wiesmühl, Burghausen (Oberbayern), or Simbach. The journey to each is around 2 hours and costs around €20. Discounts can be had with the

. 

From Burghausen (Oberbayern), either take a taxi or walk across the river into the Austrian village of Ach and find the bus station Ach b.Burghausen Ortsmitte (see By bus below).

From Tittmoning-Wiesmühl station, take a bus for 5 km to Tittmoning town. Tittmoning to Fucking is a further 11 km by road. To go from Tittmoning to Fucking may take up to two hours by foot, consider using other ways. A Tittmoning taxi company, Maier Gerlinde, can be called on +49 8683 1248.

Deutsche Bahn, the German train operator, can arrange

such as Tittmoning-Wiesmühl.

If going from Germany via Simbach/Braunau am Inn, do not buy a direct ticket to Branau am Inn. The international fare is a lot more expensive than the domestic local fare. From Simbach, either walk or take a taxi for 2 km to the Branau am Inn bus station in Kolpingplatz. Then take bus 885 (see below).
On weekdays, buses run to the village of Döstling, which is only 2 km from Fucking. Use an

.
